typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movies as (year as integer, genres as string[], rating as integer, title as string),
		titlekey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	format: 'document',
	systemColumns: true,
	throughput: 2000) ~> moviesCosmos
moviesCosmos derive(movies = @(year=movies.year,
		genres=movies.genres,
		rating=movies.rating*10,
		title=movies.title)) ~> MakeHierarchy
MakeHierarchy alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> updatePolicy
updatePolicy sink(input(
		movies as (year as string, genres as string[], rating as string, title as string),
		titlekey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	format: 'document',
	partitionKey: ['/titlekey'],
	throughput: 2000) ~> sink1
